docs.text: Airss ¶ Airss aims to create a free software proficient browsing platform with the following features: Own and control all the browsing data. Share only what they want with whom they want. Benefit from the data mining of their data to get a better browsing experience or discovering new content. Reduce the user browsing fingerprint. Self hosted.
docs.title: Introduction
